title: Headless UI Visual Refresh and Tool Empty States

requirements.item: Polish HeadlessChat layout, message bubbles, and tool cards with updated spacing, borders, and surface colors
Add informative empty states for tool calls with no output or pending results
Prevent empty assistant bubbles when hidden tool calls are the only content
Add an empty state for the Todo panel when there are no todos

e2eTests.name: Empty tool call UI
steps: Open a session with a tool call that has no result yet
Confirm the tool card shows a pending or empty placeholder instead of a blank area
Verify the placeholder disappears once the result arrives

e2eTests.name: Todo panel empty state
steps: Open a session with no todos
Confirm the Todo panel shows the empty-state message
Trigger a TodoWrite tool call and confirm the list renders items

acceptanceCriteria.item: HeadlessChat UI feels more polished and closer to design references
No empty assistant bubbles appear when hidden tool calls are the only content
